title: After setting detail custom rest request template, FieldError at /v1/projects/1/docs/68/auto-labeling: Cannot resolve keyword 'document' into field when I used auto labeling in sequence labeling project.
body:
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!--
Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment. -->

*   Operating System:  CentOS 7.6
*   Python Version Used: Python3.7.8
*   When you install doccano: about 2 weeks ago
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): Docker
---------
Is there a detail demo for auto labeling of custom rest request template? I have a local predict server for sequence labeling( BIO ) and provide restful api, so I want to know how to use auto labeling. 

here is my api demo
~~~javascript~~~
{
    "ret": "ok",
    "msg": "",
    "data": [
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "B-LOC",
        "I-LOC",
        "I-LOC",
        "B-LOC",
        "I-LOC",
        "O",
        "I-LOC",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "B-PER",
        "I-PER",
        "I-PER",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "B-LOC",
        "I-LOC",
        "I-LOC",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "B-PER",
        "I-PER",
        "I-PER",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O",
        "O"
    ]
}
